mapper.select:
select seq, id, ref, step, depth, title, content, wdate, del, readcount from (select row_number()over(order by ref desc, step asc) as rnum, seq, id, ref, step, depth, title, content, wdate, del, readcount from review where 1=1
and title like concat('%', #{search}, '%') and del=0
and content like concat('%', #{search}, '%') and del=0
and id=#{search} and del=0
order by ref desc, step asc) a where rnum between ${start} and ${end}

select ifnull(count(*), 0) from review
where title like concat('%', #{search}, '%') and del=0
where content like concat('%', #{search}, '%') and del=0
where id=#{search} and del=0
select * from review order by readcount desc
select * from review order by wdate desc
select * from review order by wdate asc
mapper.insert: insert into review(id, ref, step, depth, title, content, wdate, del, readcount) values(#{id}, (select ifnull(max(ref), 0)+1 from review r), 0, 0, #{title}, #{content}, now(), 0, 0)
mapper.update: update review set step=step+1 where ref=(select ref from (select ref from review a where seq=#{seq}) A) and step>(select step from (select step from review b where seq=#{seq}) B)
mapper.insert: insert into reivew(id, ref, step, depth, title, content, wdate, del, readcount) values(#{id}, (select ref from review a where seq=#{seq}), (select step from review b where seq=#{seq})+1, (select depth from review c where seq=#{seq})+1, #{title}, #{content}, now(), 0, 0)
insert into reviewcomment(seq, id, content, wdate) values(#{seq}, #{id}, #{content}, now())
mapper.select: select seq, id, content, wdate from reviewcomment where seq=#{seq} order by wdate desc
